name: Tournament Hosting
description: Organize and host competitive gaming tournaments with professional setup and management.

name: LAN Party Setup
description: Set up a local area network for a large-scale gaming event, including equipment and technical support.

name: Live Streaming Service
description: Provide high-quality live streaming services for gaming events, ensuring a seamless viewing experience.

name: Prize Pool Management
description: Handle the distribution of prizes, cash, and merchandise for tournament winners and participants.

name: Custom Event Branding
description: Design and implement custom branding for your gaming event, including logos, banners, and marketing materials.

name: Technical Support Team
description: Provide on-site technical support and troubleshooting for gaming setups and equipment during the event.
